ComicInfo.Summary: The Glowing Man's quest for a cure continues as Geiger, his two-headed wolf Barney, and Nate the Nuclear Knight encounter a town that's discovered the secret to peace in this post-nuclear war world. But that tranquility is threatened with the arrival of Nate's former brothers-in-arms from The Camelot Casino and their formidable leader, the New King. Plus, how violent can The Glowing Man get when a child who reminds him of his own daughter is under threat? Read this face-meltingly good issue to find out!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-20 23:40:47. [CVDB1078601]
ComicInfo.Characters: Barney, Beverly, Bonnie Borden, Carol, Geiger, Goldbeard, Karloff, Nate, Nero, Queen Vic, Richard Quarters, Ronald, Safari Bob, William Webb, Zigzag
